New Records: Steph Curry returned from a three-game injury absence
Golden State Warriors extended their three-game winning streak with Steph Curry's return
Key Match Events: Steph Curry made four immediate assists upon returning in the second quarter
Curry scored a buzzer-beater three-pointer to end the first half
Curry scored 15 points in the third quarter
Warriors had four other players with double-digit scores
Pre-Game Insights: Golden State Warriors were on a three-game winning streak without Steph Curry
Expectations were that Steph Curry would enhance the Warriors' performance
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Curry expressed pride in his team's effort
Warriors coach Steve Kerr highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant for the Golden State Warriors' momentum
The Washington Wizards' performance was noted but not detailed
